idea-plugin.change-notes:
3.8.16 (2025-04-24)

  • IMPROVEMENT/优化:

    • 提升了生成回答的正确度，优化了语言模型的上下文理解能力，使其在处理复杂编程问题和逻辑推理任务时表现更加准确。
    • Enhanced the accuracy of generated responses by improving contextual understanding in the language model, leading to better performance on complex coding and logical reasoning tasks.

  • COMPATIBILITY/兼容性:

    • 新增对 IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 版本的支持，确保插件在最新版本的 IDE 中能够稳定运行并提供完整功能。
    • Added compatibility with IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1, ensuring stable performance and full feature support in the latest IDE version.

3.8.15 (2025-03-05)

  • BUG FIX/修复:

    • 解决了当用户选中的内容包含编辑器最后一行时，生成的代码无法正确写入编辑器的问题。此问题已得到修正，确保所有生成的代码都能被准确无误地插入到指定位置。
    • Resolved an issue where, if the selected content included the last line of the editor, the generated code could not be correctly inserted into the editor. This problem has been addressed to ensure that all generated codes can be accurately placed at the designated location.
    • 修正了在特定情况下平台返回错误信息（如token无效或过期）未能弹出提示框的问题。现在，系统能够识别这些情况并适时向用户显示相应的错误提示，以提升用户体验。
    • Fixed an issue where under certain conditions error messages from the platform (such as invalid or expired tokens) did not trigger a popup alert. The system now properly detects these situations and displays relevant error notifications to the user, enhancing the overall user experience.

3.8.14 (2025-02-12)

  • FEATURE/新功能:

    • 插件新增功能：适配推理模型的返回，将推理过程中的思考内容展示在对话框中。
    • Added a new feature: Adapted the inference model’s response, displaying the reasoning process in the dialog box.

  • BUG FIX/修复:

    • 修复了任务状态管理错误，任务结束后未正确更改状态的问题。
    • Fixed an issue with task status management, where the status was not updated after the task was completed.

3.8.12 (2025-02-10)

  • FEATURE/新功能:

    • 插件新增功能：支持 DeepSeek 平台，添加 V3 和 R1 模型。
    • Added a new feature: Support for the DeepSeek platform, adding V3 and R1 models.

3.8.12 (2025-02-10)

  • FEATURE/新功能:

    • 插件新增功能：支持 DeepSeek 平台，添加 V3 和 R1 模型。
    • Added a new feature: Support for the DeepSeek platform, adding V3 and R1 models.

3.8.11 (2024-12-19)

3.7.0 (2024-06-18)

By simply highlighting the code, the plugin will call on the ChatGPT AI model to generate comprehensive and contextually appropriate code comments. 添加了使用ChatGPT自动生成代码注释的功能。只需简单地圈选代码，插件就会调用ChatGPT AI模型生成全面且符合上下文的代码注释。

    • 自动识别代码类型

idea-plugin.description:
Feature/特性

Free AIGC Access/免费使用AIGC

The AIGC capability is now freely available to all users. Enjoy intelligent generation services at no extra cost. However, due to high demand, you may need to queue each time you use this feature. AIGC能力现已向所有用户免费开放。无需额外费用，即可享受智能化的生成服务。但由于使用人数过多，每次使用此功能时可能需要排队等待。

Multi-Platform Support/多平台支持

The plugin now supports multiple platforms, including not only OpenAI's ChatGPT but also Baidu's ERNIE Bot (Wenxin Yiyan) and Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen. This ensures that users can leverage the strengths of various AI models. In the future, we plan to extend compatibility to even more platforms, providing greater flexibility and choice for our users. 插件现已支持多个平台，不仅支持OpenAI的ChatGPT，还支持百度的文心一言和阿里的通义千问。 这确保了用户可以利用各种AI模型的优势。未来，我们计划进一步扩展兼容性，支持更多平台，为用户提供更大的灵活性和选择。 <

GPT4_lll is a plugin designed for IntelliJ IDEA users, aiming to provide real-time code querying and analysis services using OpenAI's GPT-4 model. This plugin serves as a powerful assistant while you write or read code, helping you better understand and improve your code.
